summary.body: All given that we would presumably all like to remove the blight that is British telecom from our lives, could I ask: a) would people be onboard with a direct appeal to Virgin to install their fibreoptic wizardry throughout the estate b) if the technical gurus amongst us are 100% convinced that this would be better than what we now have I believe that a substantial number of local residents made a real difference in replacing the awful safeways/morrisons/somerfields with waitrose. Maybe enough of us could do similar with Virgin? PM me if you think the idea has legs and I'll happily knock up some form of petition or ecircle-up. cheers Matt
summary.subject: Virgin Media

summary.body: Although there have been a few posts on bike parking, I thought that - before approaching the Estates Office - it would be helpful to see whether there is support for better ( ) facilities to lock up bikes in the car parks. Although the bike park coffins are available, at 70 p/a these are fairly pricey ... Would anybody else support me in asking for just some basic racks that took up a couple of (empty) car park spaces that we could actually lock bikes to? This would cost virtually nothing.  Surely the Corporation could do this to enhance its green credentials?
summary.subject: Support for basic bike rack in car park?
